content: The Gentiles Bless Zion
For your light has come!
And the glory of the  is risen upon you.
For behold, the darkness shall cover the earth,
And deep darkness the people;
But the  will arise over you,
And His glory will be seen upon you.
The Gentiles shall come to your light,
And kings to the brightness of your rising.
God the Glory of His People
“The sun shall no longer be your light by day,
Nor for brightness shall the moon give light to you;
But the  will be to you an everlasting light,
And your God your glory.
Your sun shall no longer go down,
Nor shall your moon withdraw itself;
For the  will be your everlasting light,
And the days of your mourning shall be ended.
Also your people  all  righteous;
They shall inherit the land forever,
The branch of My planting,
The work of My hands,
That I may be glorified.
A little one shall become a thousand,
And a small one a strong nation.
I, the , will hasten it in its time.”
